title: Phased Array Radar
detail: It's like sonar, but with radar!
extended_details:
An X-Band Phased Array Radar that allows for multiple simultaneous target acquisitions, all using the magic of 10 GHz microwave radiation!

AKA "How can we burn the most amount of money in the least amount of time with a questionable chance of success?"

What people are saying about this project:

    "We're basically a defense contractor!  My dreams are coming true!" 
-David

    "I am ashamed to contribute to the military industrial complex.
No more questions." 
-Sam

    "Have you considered the long term carcinogenic effects of high power
10 GHz radiation?"
-Griffin
